item.title: Yell problem
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:3, topic:376362”]Told u guys a beginner error

Tyvm also[/quote]

for the record == means is equal to, so == 3 means your playerRights must be EQUAL to 3,

= is assigning the variable to something, you don’t want that.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell problem
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Oke, I have a little bit a code problem when i compile this code in my server a strange error comes up something with the operator (here have a look at the code)

} else if (command.startsWith("3") && (command.length() > 2) && (playerRights = 3)) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot talk"); else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[StaffAnouncement] " +playerName+ ": " +command.substring(2); }

I have already made work when i type ::1 message you can talk in generalchat and ::2 message you can talk in tradechat but this code won’t work hope someone can help me with this. (i think this is a beginner error)

Read full topic
